item.description: Conferences & Workshops 2024 CHIME: LLM-Assisted Hierarchical Organization of Scientific Studies for Literature Review Support, Chao-Chun Hsu, Erin Bransom, Jenna Sparks.org, Bailey Kuehl, Chenhao Tan, David Wadden, Lucy Lu Wang, Aakanksha Naik., (Findings of ACL 2024) 2023 Clinical Notes Reveal Physician Fatigue, Chao-Chun Hsu, Ziad Obermeyer, Chenhao Tan, (under submission) 2021 Decision-Focused Summarization, Chao-Chun Hsu, Chenhao Tan, EMNLP 2021 Answer Generation for Retrieval-based Question Answering Systems, Chao-Chun Hsu, Eric Lind, Luca Soldaini, Alessandro Moschitti, Findings of ACL 2021 (short) 2020 Characterizing the Value of Information in Medical Notes, Chao-Chun Hsu, Shantanu Karnwal, S.
